data.eml:eml: Two new species of Chelifera Macquart from China (Diptera: Empididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Xiwei, Yan, Shanchun, Yang, Ding (2014): Two new species of Chelifera Macquart from China (Diptera: Empididae). Zootaxa 3795 (2): 187-192, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.2.8
